text: @NC_Governor You've watched @realDonaldTrump walk around with his sheep for 3 months during the #COVID19 pandemic without masks and he wonders why you won't allow them to have the #RNC in #NorthCarolina unless their safe. Little #BunkerBoy will never understand it.
